
# RelaxCast

Relaxing sounds, anytime and anywhere. 
![RelaxCast](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/42294938/443631041-d2bb2823-8b01-4f46-8a69-998e31b378f7.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..wmUiabiJUQq36_6WLmAV1-044VL6KSTgladuj0NVf08)

## How to build
1. npm install
2. npm run build
3. npm run start
4. Open your browser and navigate to `http://localhost:3000`
5. Enjoy the relaxing sounds!

## Streaming server
https://github.com/masakifukunishi/relaxcast-streaming
